product_name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Soft-Shell Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Outdoor Research Ferrosi Soft-Shell Jacket is ideal for scrambling and climbing, and for backcountry excursions. Stretch-woven ripstop fabric is lightweight and breathable; fabric flexes to remain comfortable even with light layers underneath. Abrasion-resistant fabric stands up to rough rocks. Durable water repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Chin guard protects against zipper abrasion. The Outdoor Research Ferrosi jacket features a hem drawcord and half-elastic cuffs. Zippered hand and chest pockets; chest pocket doubles as a stuff sack with 'biner loop. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Outdoor Research Ferrosi Soft-Shell Jacket is ideal for scrambling and climbing, and for backcountry excursions.
